channel.title: Shard Revolutions - Augustus - Veni, Vidi, Vici!
channel.description:
[center][img width=500]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/1951/bannershield.png[/img] [size=12pt]• Information:[/size] I have finally decided to move on from Shit-Sanity, Artem & I will be using a Shard base along with a highly edited Galkon's renamed client (or something else depending on what he prefers, as he is our client developer.)
[size=12pt]• Developers:[/size] - Ryley Kimmel - Artem Batutin
[size=12pt]• Update Log:[/size] [code] 02/17/12 - Ryley - Wrote Weapon Poisoning 02/17/12 - Ryley - Ripped Ban Handling from another server 02/17/12 - Ryley - Added Dwarf-Multi-Cannon. Thank's Rash. <3 02/18/12 - Ryley - Got a fully working client for Artem to work with. [/code]
[size=12pt]• Media:[/size] [img width=600]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8612/51725680.png[/img] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iAPWC5SLp-U
[size=12pt]• More Information:[/size] When we decide to do this, the server will be playable for a BETA-Period, after that I would really really, like to get another server up and running for the public, it's been so long since I've had a server up! (Other than just for developing & not hosting.) [/center]

item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“dwarfs222, post:34, topic:433289”][quote author=Togasa link=topic=536008.msg4194425#msg4194425 date=1357305778]

Thank’s mate. We need more server’s in general, that aren’t PI.

Agreed. There are like 3.14159 Million PI servers

I sea waht yew did thurr
[/quote]
Oh god, really?
GRAVEDIG
Look at the date, c’mn…[/quote]
Sorry, this project is over. Ryley isn’t going to work on it. And, I am currently working on my own ‘Augustus’ http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/463345-augustus-veni-vidi-vici-667-data.html

item.title: Shard Revolutions - Augustus - Veni, Vidi, Vici!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Well, I can say so Shard is not that bad. I was taking look in some server files and its really not complicated. We got a Website/Dedi. We are about to make a “Gaming Community” in which we will see our main server Augustus. I am planning adding newer data to the client. By releasing the server later, i am sure allot more people will use it since it will have same features like PI but 10X better. We are planning on hosting the server. But also giving it a chance to remplace that shit-Insanity

Update

[hr]

Well, The first step of making a good server is to get a client working with it. I was working on the Login Decoder to bypass the client to connect. We will probably add newer Data later. I got the client connect to the server. It still have allot of more problems like Prayer skill or any other not compatible feature with the server.

OT: Sorry for my Semi-Bad English. :o

The Slogan “Veni, Vidi, Vici” Means: “I came, I saw, I conquered”

Read full topic
item.source: Shard Revolutions - Augustus - Veni, Vidi, Vici!

item.title: Shard Revolutions - Augustus - Veni, Vidi, Vici!
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:13, topic:433289”]Started messing with Items and such, figured I might as-well write something useful with them. I chose weapon poisoning simple yes.

Update: Weapon Poisoning

[hr]

[code=java]
private static int am = 1;

/**
 * 
 * @param client
 * @param pot the poison
 * @param wep the weapon
 */
public static void poisonWeapon(Client client, int pot, int wep) {

if (switchItem(wep) == 0) {
return;
}
if (Item.itemStackable[wep]) {
am = client.getActionAssistant().getItemAmount(wep);
}
client.getActionAssistant().deleteItem(pot, am);
client.getActionAssistant().deleteItem(wep, am);
client.getActionAssistant().addItem(switchItem(wep), am);
client.getActionAssistant().addItem(229, am);
client.getActionAssistant().sendMessage(“You dip your " + Server.getItemManager().getItemDefinition(wep).getName() + " in the poison.”);
}

/**
 * 
 * @param wep the original weapon id
 * @return the new weapon id
 */
public static int switchItem(int wep) {

switch (wep) {
case 806:
return 812;
case 807:
return 813;
case 808:
return 814;
case 809:
return 815;
case 810:
return 816;
case 811:
return 817;
case 825:
return 831;
case 826:
return 832;
case 827:
return 833;
case 828:
return 834;
case 829:
return 835;
case 830:
return 836;
case 863:
return 871;
case 864:
return 870;
case 865:
return 872;
case 866:
return 873;
case 867:
return 875;
case 868:
return 876;
case 869:
return 874;
case 882:
return 883;
case 884:
return 885;
case 886:
return 887;
case 888:
return 889;
case 890:
return 891;
case 892:
return 893;
case 1217:
return 1233;
case 1203:
return 1219;
case 1205:
return 1221;
case 1207:
return 1223;
case 1209:
return 1225;
case 1211:
return 1227;
case 1213:
return 1229;
case 1215:
return 5698;
case 1237:
return 1251;
case 1239:
return 1253;
case 1241:
return 1255;
case 1243:
return 1257;
case 1245:
return 1259;
case 1247:
return 1261;
case 1249:
return 1263;
}
return 0;
}
[/code][/quote]

Nice work. Looks legit

Read full topic
